amendment.description: To require an annual survey of sea grasses in the Chesapeake Bay.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5069 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5069 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5742-5743; text: CR S5742) To require an annual survey of sea grasses in the Chesapeake Bay.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5069 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5069 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 4979.
